comment:
* Interface used to receive events from Hardware objects.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public abstract void onReleased()
methods.comment: * This is called when {@link Hardware} is no longer available for the client.

methods.name: public abstract void onStreamConfigChanged(TvStreamConfig[] configs)
methods.comment:
* This is called when the underlying {@link TvStreamConfig} has been changed.
         *
         * @param configs The new {@link TvStreamConfig}s.
